Subject Matter: Draft Stillorgan Local Area Plan
Intended Results: To inform County Councillors of the vision for the Leisureplex site, including proposed public realm improvements.::To inform County Councillors of how a proposed Material Alteration No. 1 (to the Draft Stillorgan Local Area Plan) could give rise to road safety and traffic issues, impacting the future re-development of Leisureplex Site.
Lobbying Activities:
Meeting with Cllr Barry Saul to discuss the proposed amendments to the Draft Stillorgan Local Area Plan.

Local Councillors and group leaders were invited to attend a briefing on August 10th to learn about proposed Public Realm Extension and Improvements, as well as concerns in relation to the impact of the proposed Material Alteration No. 1 (to the Draft Stillorgan Local Area Plan) on the redevelopment of the Leisureplex Site, Stillorgan.|Meeting|2-5::In follow-up to the briefing, there were 2 phone calls with Cllr Barry Saul to answer questions about the proposed scheme at the Leisureplex Site, Stillorgan.|Phone call|2-5::Follow up text messages with Cllr Barry Saul regarding the organisation and attendance of parties at the briefing that took place on 10th August.|Informal communication|2-5
Current or Former DPOs: Martin Mackin|Senator|Seanad::Stephen Fitzpatrick|Councillor|Dun Laoghaire-Rathdown County Council
